## PointerControllerOptions.onSelectUp property

Select button release event handler. like [mouseup](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Element/mouseup_event)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
onSelectUp?: (el: THREE.Object3D, point: THREE.Vector3) => void;
```
